snippet: Google has released a trove of documents related to a federal investigation into its Street View mapping project. Among the documents were sworn declarations from several employees familiar with Street View denying knowledge that the cars were...
lead_paragraph: Google has released a trove of documents related to a federal investigation into its Street View mapping project. Among the documents were sworn declarations from several employees familiar with Street View denying knowledge that the cars were collecting information traveling over personal Wi-Fi networks, also known as “payload data.”
